name: Grand Defender
description:
NOT FINAL BUILD, STILL BUGGY

Pilot the giant mech Grand Defender to protect the earth from invading space cats.

Controls:

When a button is highlighted press grip to press the button or hold grip and press the button with your fingers.

Top face button of controller will recenter the HMD, you can use than if you feel the controls are too far by leaning back then re-centering, the cockpit will be much closer.
